Package org.jboss.windup.graph

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GraphContext
    Context for interacting with the underlying graph database API.
    GraphContextFactory
    Responsible for creating new GraphContext instances.
    GraphListener
    This is used to get a callback whenever changes occur to the graph.

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Adjacency
    Workaround, until this is merged and released: https://github.com/Syncleus/Ferma/pull/40
    Indexed
    Designates that a Framed method annotated with Property should be indexed by the underlying database implementation.
    Indexes
    Contains multiple Indexed annotations.
    JavaHandler
    Use a Java class to handle frame method calls.
    MapInAdjacentProperties
    Store Map in properties of a vertex.
    MapInAdjacentVertices
    Used to create a relationship as a Map.
    MapInProperties
    Store Map in vertex'es properties.
    Property
    Exists until this is fixed and released: https://github.com/Syncleus/Ferma/issues/44
    SetInProperties
    Store Map in vertex'es properties.
